refnamediv.refpurpose: Return the number of rows in statement's result set

public intstringmysqli_stmt::num_rows
&style.procedural;
intstringmysqli_stmt_num_rows mysqli_stmtstatement
Returns the number of buffered rows. The use of this function depends on whether or not you used mysqli_stmt_store_result to buffer the entire result set in the statement handle.
This function will return 0 unless all rows have been fetched from the server.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
An integer representing the number of rows in result set.
